website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, men with active lifestyles will find they have several features that make them well-suited for stay-put wear.
pros: Made for the man who prefers a sporty style for active wear, as they have polarized lenses for clear vision and non-slip stems and nose pads for added security
Wrapped lens design provides excellent coverage
cons: Though advertised as scratch resistant, at least one owner complained of lenses showing scratches after frequent but normal wear
May fit tightly on men with wide faces

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them and they are perfect for someone who has had cataract surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. The are lightweight and cover the eyes well (wrap-around). The only thing I wish I had done is ordered/chosen mine with either the Bronze or Rose lenses. I have owned several pairs of Maui Jims (different styles) and this is my first pair with the Grey lenses. I can now say for sure that I prefer the Bronze and Rose. The sharpness and color enhancements are amazing with them, whereas the Grey lenses feel brighter to my eyes and more like what you see with any old sunglasses. If you want to truly see just how "above the rest" Maui Jim is, get the Bronze or Rose lenses with your frame choice.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE P BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes better is best.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it just pays to spend what you can. I have the weirdest eyes. I have such a difficult time in the sun. After years of trying sunglasses after sunglasses... I finally broke down and purchased my first pair of Maui Jim's. So much better. I can open my eyes wide and see things so clear even in the brightest sun. I wear my Maui Jim's all year round. I only needed to purchase a second pair because someone "Borrowed" my original pair.
customer_reviews.author: PegS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHADES!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SUNGLASSES!!!! Brand new, great packaging and 2nd time I've ordered these. The first one I purchased 8 yrs ago. I hope they don't discontinue. In fact I just talked myself into buying another pair just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dark for my special eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the tint would let in too much light based on the product advertisements, but the grey tint is nice and dark. (You wouldn't want to wear them indoors.) They are expensive, but you get nice polarization (vs the cheapy brands that distort colors), and they look good on most faces. I think they look best on men, but women could definitely look good in them. Medium sized sunglasses, which are a bit larger than the sleeker, smaller cat eyed look.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a medium to large head
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for a medium to large head. Stay in place well. This is my 3rd pair I give them 3 stars because the are difficult to keep clean. I’ve sent the other pairs back to Maui Jim twice now. Great customer service at Maui Jim. It’s just a hassle to have to send them back for lens replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne

customer_reviews.title: Very Light!
customer_reviews.text: I use these sunglasses for driving and these sunglasses do a great job in reducing glare and my view is sharpened by these grey tinted glasses. For active use, the nose bridge really adheres to the nose. I have to give a little tug when I take them off, so I can see running or playing sports wearing these sunglasses to be a nice benefit when you want your sunglasses to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Big Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Excellent sun glasses - great clarity, light weight. May be a little dark for some, but I love them for driving and walking along the Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great shades!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair, replacing a pair after years of wear. Hopefully they will still make these when the second pair needs replaced. Great shades, perfect fit, will definitely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for golfing!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I ordered these specifically for playing golf. They work well as the nose piece does not slide down and the amber glass is perfect for eliminating glare but making everything bright for better visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Golf fan Di

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. So lightweight that you forget you are wearing them. If you want zero glare, these are the glasses you need.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert E Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim 4evr
customer_reviews.text: These r gr8! Comfortable fit. Keeps sun out but light in; clearly see colors, all around.
customer_reviews.author: julie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glasses! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom. She loves them! I dont buy anything but this brand. They are Awesome
customer_reviews.author: SHOPPER951

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my maui jim sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my maui jim sunglasses. I have glaucoma so it's very important for me to have really good sunglasses that protect my eyes and improve my vision while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Allen

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jims
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for hubby he already had a pair and lost them so we ordered another pair he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia  Melo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Biking
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair I love for everyday, but I needed something that would be better for biking. The glass fully covers my eye and the frames are perfectly snug, but not tight now worries about these falling off! I went with the Blue because it was $15 less and I really just planned on using them to bike, but they are stylish enough for every day if I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Broke! Easy return...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a week. But the return was so easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I believe I was in a used pair
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered seven pairs of Maui Jim sunglasses and have always been very happy I just received a pair that I believe and feel was a used pair I am extremely disappointed From now on I will strictly by my Maui Jim sunglasses from Maui Jim’s
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: just the best lens.
customer_reviews.text: just the best lens .... I had it and I lost it so I bought it again .... LOVE ITTTT AND LOVE MAUI JIM the best sunglasses for drive... the lens are the best all over the world
customer_reviews.author: firu

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shades!
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. These are my favorites. I'm very hard to find the right fit of sunglasses. I've got a rather large head with a roundish face. (All those brains my skull has to contain!) These fit comfortably and look great!
customer_reviews.author: K. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Look what you been missing!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice sunglasses. They are comfortable and vision is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hill

customer_reviews.title: He loves them- he says they are the best sunglasses he's ever had
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a surprise for my boyfriend, who in the past had only cheap sunglasses that broke on him. He loves them- he says they are the best sunglasses he's ever had, and that they actually make him see better than without glasses! Only problem is, he loves them so much that he's worried about scratching them, so he's afraid to wear them too much!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I thought these sunglasses were totally cheap looking. I sent them back and got a great pair at SportRx for only $50 more.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Staunton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for......
customer_reviews.text: On the expensive side, as are all the good ones, but EXACTLY what I needed. I have had a (repaired) detached retina in one eye and lenses replaced in both eyes, and am very sensitive to bright lights and glare. These are clear, distortion free, very light and fit like a glove........LOVE em.....
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Such a lightweight frame with wrap around fit, these sun glasses don’t leave any marks on your nose or face.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Regnier

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husbands birthday. He loves them. He wears them everyday since. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Armelis

customer_reviews.title: shipper pictured showed a nice Hard glass case...received a plastic cardboard case?
customer_reviews.text: somewhat disappointed in the shipper...the photos showed a nice Maui Jim hard case but they shipped the sunglasses in a plastic cardboard case????
customer_reviews.author: David Morin

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Maui Jim for years - these are fabulous glasses. No glare, polarization is fabulous, fit is perfect. I was worried as it didn't say "mens" when I ordered it, but they fit great, and I don't have a large head.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Just what I expected. Love them. Very sporty. Optics are first class.
customer_reviews.author: B (mofo) P

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but you get what you pay for. These are fantastic sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses and real Maui-Jims
customer_reviews.text: Fit great look great and this is my 3rd pair, lost first pair had for 3 years and bought 2nd pair and ordered a 3rd pair for work. Work great for riding on the Harley.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are pretty good. Not the usual crystal clear clarity you are used to in Maui Jim sunglasses. Also, the nose piece is rubber and it is pretty annoying. Think twice before ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Maui Jim's - would purchase another pair without question. Lightweight, color is great, use them for skiing in the winter and water skiing in the summer - keeps the glare down like no other.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've enjoyed these MJ glasses for over a month now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed these MJ glasses for over a month now and very pleased with my purchase. They are lighter than my previous MJ's called Kahuna. Vision and sun blocking features are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Bound

customer_reviews.title: I loved them! I have owned Maui Jim’s for many ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an outdoor dog trial. I loved them! I have owned Maui Jim’s for many years, only glasses I purchase. I need a lite weight pair for outside all day that wouldn’t make my face sweat. These are perfect. A little big for a woman’s face but I loves the reviews and tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Janes

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim sunglasses are great
customer_reviews.text: I have other Maui Jim sunglasses & these like the others are great glasses
customer_reviews.author: JRussell

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these frames
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these frames. Super comfortable and light. Easy to wear all day. Lenses are top quality and the styling is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: John Osgood

customer_reviews.title: light and comfortable to wear and even driving for hours into the ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sunglasses, regardless of style, light and comfortable to wear and even driving for hours into the sun they protect my eyes and don't leave my eyes feeling strained.
customer_reviews.author: Big John G.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get in stores...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, good communication. Fit was not right on the nose bridge and had to return, but the product was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Savi user

customer_reviews.title: They're keepers
customer_reviews.text: Nice shade prevents eye strain when going from bright light to shadows. The wrap around style prevents bright light from hitting the eye from each side. They look good too.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.D.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I returned them...uncomfortable nose piece and were not tight fitted to my head Great lenses and looks though
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Better price. Really like the lenses and frames.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Mullen

customer_reviews.title: As much as I liked them I like these much better
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my MJ Volcano sunglasses after 15 years. As much as I liked them I like these much better. Lighter but with the same, if not better, peripheral vision
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sierakowski

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses around.
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses I have owned. I use them for running, biking, driving, and paddle boarding. I had cataract surgery and have sensitivity to bright light. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful product! No complaints with the order process at ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful product! No complaints with the order process at all, delivered quicker than expected. Product was new and unopened as expected. BTW, if you happen to have a larger than normal head this model of Maui Jim fits wonderfully (they have a handful of sunglasses made for larger-than-average noggins). You won't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Geary

customer_reviews.title: Glad I spent the money
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a pair of Maui Jim sunglasses at a wedding over the summer and was impressed at how sharp and clear everything appeared. My concern was finding a pair that would work well when I run. Mission accomplished. These fit great and stay put, even in the sweaty last mile.
customer_reviews.author: reallymee13

customer_reviews.title: Makes the colors pop!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I went out onto Lake Powell with them and the colors pop! The fall colors were also spectacular along with the clarity and detail.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Great shades
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shades. Tried river jetty first and should have listened to reviews. They are way too small. Hot Sands are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent glasses. Very high surface tension on lenses - dried saltwater marks wipe right off
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bauder

customer_reviews.title: bought these for my husband who is now officially spoiled ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my husband who is now officially spoiled. he loves these. he said they are are so clear. he likes that the sides are snug against his face and hopes he wont have tan lines anymore. arrived quickly too. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: KFilo

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: If you love Maui Jim's why not get them at a better price that you will find at the malls? These are the same exceptional quality as other Maui Jim products. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND LOVES HOW LIGHT AND COMFORTABLE THESE GLASSES ARE
customer_reviews.author: Christiane Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a pair I had for at least 10 years. If I hadn’t dropped them in the driveway and run over them, they’d still be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fit well without a lot of pressure on my nose or above my ears. Only complaint was they were advertised as new and what I got were either a return or a display model.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the highest quality sunglasses I've ever used. The lens quality is what really sets them apart. The frames are strong, comfortable and lightweight. For extended, high-intensity exercise they do not fog up easily because of the open-frame design. I've owned Maui Jims before, and they lasted a very long time (over 6 years).
customer_reviews.author: BTU Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it sits comfortably on my face and wraps around enough that its able to block the wind during a bicycle ride. Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeQue

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim makes good sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim made another great pair of sunglasses! They are good quality and the price was better than anything we found in the stores. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: blumax
customer_reviews.text: The best sunglasses....this one,hot sands, is great piece. I have worn maui Jim since.1974 on the beach son maui...they will save your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: BLUMAX(maxineallin)

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! Comfortable, look great. Getting lots of compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Great for golf and the FL sun
customer_reviews.text: These are the only sunglasses I wear. Great for golf and the FL sun.
customer_reviews.author: LFG

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim's Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of shades. A little high priced, but worth the cash. I have sensitive eyes and live in the Palm Springs desert so the Maui Jim's fit the bill just right. They fit my face perfectly, and don't slide off my nose. If you have the $200 Washington's, then this is your best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Watts

customer_reviews.title: These are my first pair of Maui Jim and I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Maui Jim and I don’t regret purchasing them. The comfort, light weight glasses along with its clarity lens are second to none.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love Maui-Jim's... but you do pay the premium price

customer_reviews.title: Love these shades
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades. A little tight the first few days but once they loosened up a bit they are awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shades
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shades. High quality and lightweight. Expensive for me but I think you get what you pay for and in this case these are probably worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Great for stink eye.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these. You can give people the stink eye and.you.cant.be seen.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the pic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. It was for my significant other he loves them

customer_reviews.title: They r great
customer_reviews.text: They r the perfect fit, color, and I like the way they reflect the sun. They will be great for Hawaii next month

customer_reviews.title: great shipping, product was as described
customer_reviews.text: prefect, just what i needed.great shipping, product was as described.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent actually the second time ordering as I had to replace a pair my dog ruined the first pair...

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising or driving
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable; ideal for running or driving. First time I have ordered bronze lens and I would never go back to black or grey lens again; imagines very crisp.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great acquisition. I was amazed on how light and the fit of these sunglasses are.

customer_reviews.text: They were ok but didn’t look right on me.i returned them!

customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses, but they are a little large for my frame.

customer_reviews.title: This is my third purchase so I like the shape of the lens and the polarized lens ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase so I like the shape of the lens and the polarized lens as well. Tried Ray Ban but not quite right for me.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: so fresh and so clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these sun glasses. I have a wide round face and they fit me well and look good .
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Good Sunglasses but Very Big.
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality glasses and provide clarity as well as UV protection. However though they fit snugly but are really big. I'm 60 and I looked like the old guy with the huge sunglasses who just had some kind of eye exam. Will problem give them to my big headed son.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit very comfortably, and the view through them is fantastic! Worth the money

customer_reviews.title: I already have a pair of Maui Jim that are wonderful and I would never do without them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. I already have a pair of Maui Jim that are wonderful and I would never do without them. This pair looked great and the person who received them totally loved them! The frames are comfortable and work with an active lifestyle. The polarized lens are great for the beach, boating or really sunny days. I would only buy Maui Jim glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, confortables, nice look. Every day and some. Nice crystal vision. Drivers option.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are light and the quality is fantastic. You can't go wrong with Maui Jim's.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The correct pair are wonderful, had to returnthesecond pair as wrongglasses, frustrating,as bought for Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great and fit vey well
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these glasses. They look great and fit vey well.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fillion

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and working out
customer_reviews.text: Love them.. What can i say about Maui Jim.. Reduces the glare fits just right on my face light and confortable
customer_reviews.author: edwin

customer_reviews.title: lenses make the difference
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of sunglasses at this price but the lens is great. You can see clearly, not too dark or too light. I had a pair of $50 sunglasses and the lens is much better. Makes you want to wear them. frame is the same as any pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are amazing! They are very nice on the eye!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Papappanastos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great clarity & more polarization to filter than my cheaper alternatives. So far they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Ghosey

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very good sunglasses. I only wish that it came with some cleaning products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maui Waui
customer_reviews.text: No other sunglasses compare! My fourth pair of Maui's; previous three titanium rimless have been involuntarily donated to the depths of Lakes Minnetonka and Minnewaska. Just received these the other day and used them on the boat for the first time. They stayed secure on my head at high speeds (60+ mph). The clarity is unmatched. Loved all my Maui's and plan on getting another pair of Titanium's. However, I'll be using these on the boat from now on :) You get what you pay for!!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a very easy customer. Maui Jim was not my first choice. I was selecting Oakley at Macys and it was by chance I saw this beauty next to it. I have to admit, that I wanted to buy it then and there, but for some reason I decided to stop my impulse and do a little more research. I found the same one on Amazon at a much reduced price. Got it on the 2nd day via Amazon prime, and it is so lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Ajith Unni

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Sunglasses not Sliders!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! Perfect fit and stays up on the nose. These are not sliders! No nose prongs holding them up. No indentations in the nose. Comfortable to wear and good eye coverage. The wrap around style helps block sun from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love them , great for seeing the fish in Belize.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Low

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lightweight comfortable sunglasses. The polarization makes things interesting however. Some of the screens in the car are full of rainbows. You get used to it though.
customer_reviews.author: Catpillow

customer_reviews.title: great glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sun glasses I think I have ever had. They keep everything so clear. My advise, buy them
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses - but
customer_reviews.text: Got these sunglasses about a year ago. One of the most comfortable pairs og glasses I've ever worn. Looked great and felt great. Unfortunately, after less than a year they're almost unusable due to micro scratches in the lenses. I assume they're from wiping the lenses with the enclosed cloth, but the plastic lenses on these glasses are very easily scratched. Those same lenses are part of the reason these glasses are so comfortable as they make the glasses extremely light. But they are not scratch resistant at all.
customer_reviews.author: GLM

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. Very good in variable light. Extremely sharp vision. Fit well.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD Harcar

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Hot Sands Rectangular Sunglasses
product_meta.description: The Hot Sands are a sporty pair of rimless polarized sunglasses, made of polycarbonate for superior durability and with a variety of of lens color options to fit any type of lifestyle. Named for a popular surf spot in Lahaina, these frames will always deliver fun in the sun.
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premuim style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
Neutral Grey lenses offer the highest available light reduction and are most useful in bright, direct sunlight
Frames constructed from lightweight, injected nylon, designed for extreme comfort and extended wear time
